desc: The course begins with an in-depth look at a plant cell and its physiology, followed by a discussion of whole plant physiology as it relates to cellular functions. Students attend lectures plus one 3-hour laboratory per week. Taught annually. Prerequisites: Biology 125 and 126, Chemistry 125 and 126.
name: Plant Physiology
notes: Students in Bio 251 must also register for one lab Bio 251 AL or BL.
